problem_text_cn: 如图,一辆小车沿倾斜角为α的斜坡向上行驶13米,已知sinα=\frac{5}{13},则小车上升的高度是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a trolley drives up N_0 along a slope with an inclination angle of α, and it is known that sinα = \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the ascent height of the trolley is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图AC=13,作CB⊥AB,∵sinα=\frac{z_{6}}{A}=√{|➝{JL}|^{2}-|➝{JL}|^{2}}=\frac{5}{13},∴BC=5,∴小车上升的高度是5m．故选:A．
